Ramhorn/Double Punch/Manterror/Injector/Hades/Anubis/Koga Shuko:



(Due to Teltoli's unfortuante leaving, Ramhorn never entered the war room of 
the Ark)

Walking into the bridge, a little down, Ramhorn checked the scanners.  Iron 
Raptor and Prowl.  Those two had been gone for several mega-cycles.  Suddenly 
Ramhorn's mind got an idea.  If those two had actually been there, or if any 
other Maximal other than the renegade (and psychotic in his pro. opinion) 
Suukie had been there, Stinkbomb would've lived.  But no.  The pathetic 
Maximal forces lead by that fool Liono Prime did absolutely nothing.  
    "That's it!  I've had enough of this!  I won't stay here just to make 
more friends, and literally watch them die!  I'm out of here...these idiots 
have already slagged up the timeline almost beyond repair.  I won't take any 
part of this." Ramhorn yelled.  Going to his quarters, he gathered his few 
belongings.  Tapping into the light source of his room, he was able to gather 
some spare energon.  Walking down to the bottom of the Autobot craft, the 
doors slid open.  Looking to Prowl and Iron Raptor, who were kind of in his 
way (though he could've walked around).  Surging forward he shoved (don't 
mean to mode) through between them, swearing at them and calling them vulgar 
names in ancient Cybertronian, heading east in the direction of Africa.

===================

Double Punch watched Jackle and Pheonix pass him, at a fast pace.  
"Hmmm...let us help them." he said, looking back to Manterror and Injector.  
Both Predacons nodded with evil smiles, all three running off after the two 
other Preds.

Upon reaching where they had followed Jackle and Pheonix, they spotted 
Mantella, and Quickstrike.  Guns raised from Jackle and Pheonix.  
"I'll cover Quickstrike, you two cover that Mantella freak." Double Punch 
yelled, cloaking in his steath mode, moving a dozen feet so he didn't stay in 
the same area, raising an invisible pincher, 10 feet away from Quickstrike.  
Two energy-signature seeking missiles targeted at the Fuzor's chest.

At the same time, Injector and Manterror raised their weapons at Mantella, 
stinger missiles and ion disks aimed at the other Predacon.

"What seems to be the problem?" Injector yelled, to Jackle and Pheonix, 
hoping there was going to be a fight.  He'd prove he was the best of the best 
in the Predacon forces.

======================

Koga Shuko mumbles inaudibly, calling Set an idiot.  "Next time, come to me 
and talk.  I'm busy planning our next attack." he said sternly leaving the 
the room, cycles later entering the lab.  Walking up to the evident cloning 
device, he looked at the computer part.  89% complete.  Looking over the 
figure, it looked like it would be over 7 feet tall.  From the feet to the 
middle of the chest was completely re-animated.  "Ah, you will be a valuable 
asset indeed."

===================

Anubis looked to Hades.
"This is boring.  We should do something constructive."

"Like what?" Hades asked.

"Repair the hull."

"Oh." he replied, a little discouraged.  "Aright."

Activating his com, Anubis spoke.  <Koga Shuko, Anubis,  Hades and I will be 
fixing the hull of the ship.  If you require anything let us know> he spoke, 
Koga replying that was a good idea.  Both Predacons chuckled, heading for the 
cargo bay of the craft to get the necessary parts and tools.
